document.full_text: novak djokovic, the man who had seemed unstoppable for five months, finally met his match against old hand roger federer in the french open semi-finals on friday but the serbian had no regrets.
document.title: halted djokovic harbors no regrets after loss to federer
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic, the man who had seemed unstoppable for five months, finally met his match against old hand roger federer in the french open semi-finals on friday but the serbian had no regrets.
